OmniProcessElement.Name: TextBlock3
OmniProcessElement.PropertySetConfig:
{"controlWidth":12,"label":"TextBlock3","text":"

Please open the form on your desktop to submit it to recognitionreconnaissance@csps-efpc.gc.ca.

","show":null,"dataJSON":false,"HTMLTemplateId":"","textKey":"","sanitize":false}

OmniProcessElement.Name: TextBlock4
OmniProcessElement.PropertySetConfig:
{"controlWidth":12,"label":"TextBlock4","text":"

IMPORTANT: 
Long service awards are considered a non-taxable benefit as long as it is a non-cash gift, in recognition of five or more years of service, it has been at least five years since the last time the employer gave the employee a long-term service award and the face market value of the award does not exceed $500. For more information, consult CRA’s administrative policy regarding gifts, awards and long-service awards.  The retirement certificate is an award provided to employees for outstanding service and is considered a non-taxable benefit. For more information, consult CRA’s administrative policy regarding gifts, awards and long-service awards.

","show":null,"dataJSON":false,"HTMLTemplateId":"","textKey":"","sanitize":false}
